title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 21, ch. LVIII, pt. 5004 - Loans
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 21, ch. LVIII, pt. 5004 - Loans

State Regulations
§ 5004.1 - General requirements for all loans
§ 5004.2 - Additional eligibility requirements for members with a date of membership before July 27, 1976 (Tiers I and II)
§ 5004.3 - Additional eligibility requirements for members with a date of membership on or after July 27, 1976 (Tiers III, IV and V)
§ 5004.4 - Repayment of loans
§ 5004.5 - Interest on loans
§ 5004.6 - Insurance on loans
§ 5004.7 - Charges
§ 5004.8 - The effect on unpaid loans of death, retirement, withdrawal or transfer to another retirement system for Tiers I and II members
§ 5004.9 - The effect on unpaid loans of death, retirement, withdrawal or transfer to another retirement system for Tier III, IV and V members
§ 5004.10 - Loan default
§ 5004.11 - Executive director's authority
§ 5004.12 - Loan repayments during periods of military service

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. tit. 21, ch. LVIII, pt. 5004

Statutory authority: Education Law, §§ 504[1], 512-b;Retirement and Social Security Law, §§517-b, 613-a

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
